QuestData.Title: The Orc Report
QuestData.Description: Sifting through the loose dirt, the severed hand of an orc is found. And clutched in the hand is a bone-carved tube. And in the tube is a dirt-stained parchment.$B$BThe parchment is written in orcish... and it looks important.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Spy's Report to Lieutenant Aden in Theramore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have a report to make?
QuestData.RewardText: Hm... I can't read orcish very well, but this looks like a report... written by an orc spy!
